comment.author: 25472775@N03
comment._content:
This is an amazing collection! But why are these photos not being uploaded to flickr in full resolution? They are huge on the timeframes website however the websites zooming feature prevents them from  being easily downloaded. 
I can understand that the Turnbull Library may want to stop people from accessing restricted material in full resolution but these photo's are now in the public domain. What gives?

comment.author: 32741315@N06
comment._content:
Hi Mr Fix It

I've just sent a reply to your Flickr mail version of this question - thanks for the feedback, we're always trying to do better on The Commons to give the Flickr community what it wants and needs.

-- Courtney
comment.authorname: National Library NZ on The Commons
